title: Chargeback payed, Still I am Banned
body: Recently I've went through this progress of repaying back the money, which is 250USD for the chargeback I did few days ago. However it's been like 2 days now and my account is still stated as "permanently suspended" Can someone explain me why is that.

replies.body: It may take a bit to get it processed and restore the account.  Feel free to reach out to our billing team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and they can offer more context to your specific case as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=mGGRL32a,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-30T15:22:46.235+0000)
>
> It may take a bit to get it processed and restore the account.  Feel free to reach out to our billing team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and they can offer more context to your specific case as well.

And since then sir, my account is still unbanned because I cant verify myself as the owner of my own account, like seriously, can you help me out and unban my damn account because i think that only psychopath can remember everything about their account 7 years ago. :(
